Description:
Outstanding designer home.
This impressive contemporary home has been meticulously designed and must be seen to be believed. Comprising four large bedrooms; including main with ensuite and spacious dressing room. The modern kitchen features stone benchtops, feature lighting and walk in pantry while overlooking the sun filled living area and enclosed alfresco complete with heating. The home boasts elegant internal décor including window furnishings, epoxy floor and with 2.7m high ceilings the home is grand and inviting.
Step outside and the long list of features continue - three car garage with rear roller door, separate side access (perfect for the caravan), security camera system plus low maintenance established landscaped front and rear gardens. This trendy residence successfully combines comfort and practicality to provide an exceptional home.
Nearby cycling and walking trails enhance the lifestyle options available plus exclusive access to the Mandalay Estate club offering gym, pool and tennis courts make this home the epitome of stylish resort living. Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
A Masterpiece Family Home Built to The Highest Standards!!!
Harcourts Roxburgh Park proudly present's "5 northfield drive, Craigieburn". In the heart of Highlands! Quality, Space and Style are all apparent as you drive up to this unique family home.close to Mt Ridley's array of parks & playgrounds, endless Malcolm Creek trails, Aitken
Boulevard buses & Highlands Shopping Centre, as well as popular schools including Mount Ridley College, Mother Teresa Primary School & Hume Anglican Grammar.
Completed to perfection - this home offers:
- Master Bedroom with Full En-suite and WIR
- 3 Generous Bedrooms with BIR's
- Large Living Zones
- Dinning area
- Breathtaking Kitchen
- Walk In Pantry
- Multiple Kitchens
- Central Bathroom
- Rumpus
-Laundry Room
- Alfresco
- Double Lock Up Garage
Luxury Extra's and Upgrades Include:
- Heating | Cooling
- Remote Garage
- Dishwasher
- Stone Bench Top
- Ducted Vacuum
- LED light
-High ceiling
- Landscaped garden
To book your inspection or discuss this beautiful family home in more detail - please feel free to contact Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 . Photo ID required for all inspections.
Inspections available 7 days a week.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Stylish Double Story Family Home in Premium Location
Expression of Interest closing by 4th of July by 5.00pm.
Stylish Double Story Family Home in Premium Location
This quality build family home is only 5-year-old and still comes with balance of builders warranty, built designed to live, entertain and enjoy a unique lifestyle with family and friends for years to come, combining modern free flowing floorplan and unparalleled quality, showcasing commanding street presence.
Sitting amongst the finest neighbourhood in a very sought after location close to walking distance to Craigieburn central, local schools, well maintained park lands, health & leisure centres and public transport, this is the perfect home where you want to grow your family.
The notable features are
Large double story home on approx. 460 m2 land
4 bedrooms plus study makes it ideal for a large family.
Spacious kitchen with walk in pantry and 900mm SS appliances
Luxury master suite with access to its own balcony with uninterrupted views of the parkland just opposite the house.
Decked grand alfresco to entertain friends and family for years to come.
Evaporative cooling & ducted heating
6.5 kw solar panels
High ceilings and plantation shutters throughout
Remote operated double garage.
Spacious low maintenance backyard. Let your kids & pets run freely in the safety of your backyard.
Inspection is must. Call today.
Photo ID Required Upon Inspection
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. While all care has been taken to ensure the information provided herein is correct, we do not take responsibility for any inaccuracies. Accordingly all interested parties should make their own enquiries to verify the information.

Description:
Lot 495 Platypus Chase, Beveridge
Introducing the beautiful Ooranya Estate, situated in Beveridge, located in metropolitan Melbourne, governed by the City of Whittlesea and Mitchell Shire. Moving to Beveridge is a lifestyle choice your family will thank you for. Ooranya Estate is perfect for those wanting close proximity to the city, as well as well as some of the norths most established wineries, beautiful parks, large shopping centres, and more than enough room for your family.
Situated conveniently to the Hume freeway makes for a short 45 minute drive to the CBD, and 50 minutes to the beautiful Macedon Ranges, Ooranya Estate is an idyllic location. With Daylesford, Woodend and Hepburn Springs being so close, these popular spots will most certainly be on the cards for family day trips.
With the Mandalay Golf Course beside the estate, the shopping hub and entertainment centre of Craigeburn on your doorstep and Wallan train station that drops your CBD commute to just 35 minutes, there is something for every member of the family.
Generous block size of up to 600 square metres, mean plenty of space for a backyard and outdoor activities. The community will be made up of 660 homes which surround an enormous 1.5 hectare park, perfect for kids.
Furthermore, a large community space is planned directly opposite the estate with new facilities for you to enjoy and local sporting games. More benefits include: the new Beveridge Primary School campus, the existing primary school as well as childcare centres giving you a variety of options for your childs education.
Ooranya residents will experience the very best of both worlds, on the cusp of country and city living at an affordable price. For more information go to www.propertysalesaustralia.net.au

Description:
Stunning Location, Supreme Comfort and Cool Living!
110 BLUEBELL DRIVE, CRAIGIEBURN
Zain Real Estate is proud to present this stunning, low maintenance, young and exciting home in one of the best spots of Craigieburn. This custom-built home is situated within walking distance to Public Transport, Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare, Hume Hockey Club & Eateries on Grand Boulevard.
This beautifully maintained home comprises of a fully functional floor plan containing a well-resourced kitchen with quality appliances, 3 spacious bedrooms featuring master with en-suite, walk-in robe & 2 good size bedrooms with built-In robes. The living zone consists of a formal lounge connected to a full thriving backyard and independent meals area.
Other features include:
**Ducted heating,
**Evaporative Cooling,
**Automatic garage with inside and rear access,
**Stainless steel kitchen appliances,
**Quality floorboards
**Well-presented floor plan
Call Ahmad Hashmi on 0423 646 730 for any further information.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Photo ID is a must.
Internal area

This opportunity won't last long!

A Perfect First Start
Located in the heart of a booming suburb and a stone through away from Craigieburn Central shopping centre, this well-presented home is very ideally situated. Close by to public transport, schools, parklands, walking trails and all of Craigieburn's in-demand amenities makes this property the perfect investment. Comprising of 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, large central bathroom, additional powder room, seperate laundry room, great size kitchen with adjoining meals and family room, alfresco area, LARGE backyard perfect for the kids to run around securely and more.
Additional features including double lock up garage with remote control and internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling just to highlight a few.
An inspection is A must to truly appreciate this beautiful home. Call Now To Arrange An Appointment.

Description:
The Perfect Start!
In a secluded cul-de-sac with Aitken Creek parkland at the end of the street with easy access to walking/cycling trails, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, local schools and Craigieburn Golf Course. This beautiful single storey home delivers an exceptional low-maintenance lifestyle opportunity with its ideal design.
Featuring 3 bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all with BIR's), open plan living including good size kitchen with ample cupboard space that over looks meals and family area with access to an impressive outdoor decking entertaining area and plenty of space for the growing family to enjoy, main central bathroom, separate toilet, side driveway leading to a single garage with drive through & internal access.
Fixtures & fittings including: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, kitchen appliances, dishwasher, timber venetians, Cafe blinds and much more

Description:
LOCATION, COMFORT & EASY LIVING
Sahil Kakar & The Eleet Group are proud to present another marvellous, spacious & spectacular home in one of the most prominent location in Craigieburn at 20 Scarborough Tce.
This home provides you a free flowing floor plan inside & a bold look outside. In midst of spec homes this beauty was once a display home(The Mornington Display) which has preserved its glamour for past number of years. Exquisitely maintained, it has been a home to caring owners, therefore providing an excellent opportunity to a first home buyer, an investor or an upsizing family.
Sitting on an massive 575SQM land allotment, this sizeable 29sq home is a treat for any home buyer or investor. Only on the rarest occasion does an allotment offering such dramatic dimensions and irresistible potential become available in such rewarding context as this sought after location, here in the heart of Craigieburn. This grand location is walking distance to 4 top schools in vicinity of 850 metres to 2kms, 900 metres to Highland Shopping Centre & highlands hotel, 6 mins to Craigieburn Station & Craigieburn Central, 3 mins to Pelican child Care & 5 mins to Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, making this an uncompromising location.
Boasting a sun drenched wide footage & sleek contemporary spaces, this immaculate home offers a stylish lifestyle.The residents can also enjoy 2 side entrance and exit from the lounge & dining area to the side and back yard. The fully decked alfresco at the back provides the best means for outdoor entertainment for small or large gatherings.
Overall the residence is equipped with quality fixtures and fittings throughout and is beautifully presented.
** Master Bedroom with Walk In Robe & a Sizeable En-suite
** Ducted Heating & Evaporative Cooling
** Seperate Study
** 5.5 Kw Solar Panels to avoid any shocks with increasing electricity prices
** Large spacious Kitchen with 900MM stainless steel appliances & plenty of quality cabinetry for storage
** Fully decked Large Alfresco area for outdoor entertainment accompanied by 4 roller mesh/weather sheet
** Foldable back yard entrance glass door
** Porcelain tiles matched with quality carpeting in bedrooms
** Automated Double Garage
** Wide 18M Frontage
** 8 CCTV Cameras for your security 24*7 & front entrance crime safe door
** Feature walls to uplift the ambience & beauty of the home
This opportunity gives you the dream home you always wanted & is not to be missed.
Call Sahil on 0401 926 466 to arrange an inspection as this wont last long.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Virtual Tours Available on Request
Internal area
267m²

Description:
Titled Land In Donnybrook - Kinkbrook Estate
Viccivic Real Estate proudly presents an opportunity not to be missed. Situated in Kinbrook Estate, measuring 392m2 (approx.), titled and ready to build that dream home you have always wanted. Boasting a full 14m frontage, this generous block provides all the space needed for you to bring to reality the design of your dreams.
Location:
. Close to Hume Anglican Grammar School
. Just a few minutes' drive down donnybrook Road will take you to the new commercial centres of Merrifield and Cloverton.
. A short 15 minutes' drive to the vibrant township of Craigieburn as well as Epping and Wallan for even more education, medical, transportation and entertainment services.
. Upcoming 22 hectares of open space to enjoy and explore lush parks, waterways, trails, wide range of sporting facilities including two ovals with cricket nets, and netball courts.
. Upcoming olivine café.
. Direct access to Melbourne's CBD in just 45 minutes from nearby Donnybrook station.
. Proposed new Cloverton station is planned for the future serving both the Cloverton and olivine communities.

Description:
Family Living on the Green
Tee off from your front door step with this amazing opportunity in the heart of the family friendly Fairways Estate.
Defined by its intelligent design and long list of inclusions, this spacious home presents an outstanding lifestyle for families looking to secure their future in a quiet cul-de-sac. The home's free-flowing interior comprises 4 great size bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite), sparkling family bathroom, spacious living zones including a oversized seperate lounge, and an expansive open-plan family/dining area complemented by a well- appointed kitchen with ample bench space, HUGE walk-in-pantry, and stainless steel appliances.
Step outside to a private backyard with alfresco area - perfect for those that like to entertain! Further features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, great privacy, double remote garage with internal entry, and much more.
Within seconds to Craigieburn's Public Golf Course and Aitken Creek trails, this home is also close to Schools, Public Transport, Local Shops, both Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre and many more Craigieburn amenities. What a home, what a location!

Description:
An Investor's Delight!!!
Single-level, stylish and surprisingly spacious over a generous 549m2 (approx.), this well-presented 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home is ready for all home buyers, empty nesters and investors alike. Nestled in a quiet locale and cleverly configured with a flexible floorplan, enjoy the opportunity to relax, rest and retreat with the added attraction of an enticing outdoor entertaining area.
The layout has been designed to enhance indoor/outdoor living opportunities, spilling out to a 6 x 8m pergola. This special retreat is ideal for entertaining with an adjacent lawn providing a natural play area for growing families.
All bedrooms are well-sized and robed with the main boasting a glistening en-suite and the luxury of walk-in robes. Comprehensive features include a fully renovated kitchen with white high gloss cabinetry, 40mm stone bench tops, glass splash-back, 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher,
Extras include: solar panels, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, water tanks, a remote-controlled double garage with a single roller door access to the rear, bamboo flooring, window furnishings, led down-lights throughout, alarm system, garden shed, separate laundry and much more.
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.

Description:
Titling in December
Introducing the beautiful Ooranya Estate, situated in Beveridge, located in metropolitan Melbourne, governed by the City of Whittlesea and Mitchell Shire. Moving to Beveridge is a lifestyle choice your family will thank you for. Ooranya Estate is perfect for those wanting close proximity to the city, as well as well as some of the norths most established wineries, beautiful parks, large shopping centres, and more than enough room for your family.
Situated conveniently to the Hume freeway makes for a short 45 minute drive to the CBD, and 50 minutes to the beautiful Macedon Ranges, Ooranya Estate is an idyllic location. With Daylesford, Woodend and Hepburn Springs being so close, these popular spots will most certainly be on the cards for family day trips.
With the Mandalay Golf Course beside the estate, the shopping hub and entertainment centre of Craigeburn on your doorstep and Wallan train station that drops your CBD commute to just 35 minutes, there is something for every member of the family.
Generous block size of up to 600 square metres, mean plenty of space for a backyard and outdoor activities. The community will be made up of 660 homes which surround an enormous 1.5 hectare park, perfect for kids.
Furthermore, a large community space is planned directly opposite the estate with new facilities for you to enjoy and local sporting games. More benefits include: the new Beveridge Primary School campus, the existing primary school as well as childcare centres giving you a variety of options for your childs education.
Ooranya residents will experience the very best of both worlds, on the cusp of country and city living at an affordable price. For more information go to www.propertysalesaustralia.net.au

Description:
Corner Gem
Calling out to the first home buyers, families, and developers, set in a quiet location is this brick veneer home. Comprising 3 large bedrooms, master with full ensuite other rooms with built in wardrobes, a study/4th bedroom, a bright family area. A second family area adjoining meals area. A large bright functional kitchen with lots of space, central bathroom and laundry, an outdoor decking, a second outdoor entertainment area and a corner access to multiple car parks.
Features include:
Split system, ducted heating, solar panels, dish washer, 900mm stainless steel appliances, sky light window shutters and spa.
What we love about the property?
Set on a large corner block approx. 642M2.
Walking distance to schools.
Walking distance to shops.
Walking distance to bus stops.
Development site (STCA).
A short drive to Craigieburn central.
Walking distance to the train station.
Side access.
The list goes on, to inspect Call now 0425 778 166

Description:
This is Where the Dream Begins
An increasingly rare opportunity to secure your future in Donnybrook's sought-after Kinbrook community, this sizeable allotment provides the perfect blank canvas on which to create your very own residential masterpiece. Key attributes of the block include uniform dimensions all-round (approx 12.5m x 21m - 262sqm), negligible gradient from one end to the other, as well as all essential services available for connection. This thriving Kinbrook neighbourhood will also offer close proximity to the area's key masterplan amenities including landscaped parks and a range of sports facilities, local shopping village and future schools, as well as easy access now to both Donnybrook Station and the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Renovated and a great location!
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Roxburgh Park's most sought-after pocket with close proximity to all major amenities.
This magnificent single storey home offering 2 spacious living rooms, good size kitchen with ample cupboard space overlooking meals and family area with access to an outdoor entertaining area, 3 bedrooms (master with full ensuite and BIR's), central bathroom, separate toilet, separate laundry, single garage with drive through access.
Fixtures and fittings include: Central heating & cooling, Stainless steel appliances and much much more.

Description:
This has to be a Perfect Opportunity for First Home Buyers or Investors! Titled And Ready To Build
Imagine building your dream house in an estate offering you and your family a relaxed, healthy & active
lifestyle, community living, open spaces, parkland surroundings. Tree lined streets, walking /bike paths.
Explore: Merri and Kalkallo Creeks, John Laffan Memorial Reserve - a sports venue. It is a very quick drive
or an option to simply walk to Donnybrook Station. Where in minutes a drive takes you to Primary,
Secondary & Tertiary schools to choose from. Drive on the freeway to Melbourne CBD in 36 mins and 26
mins to Melbourne Airport, future plans for commercial /retail precinct and apart of all these there is so
much more to offer with a country lifestyle and a city approach.
Dimensions
Front 10.2m approx
Depth21m approx
Total Land Size 222m2 approx
You don't want to miss out this opportunity to live in one of the fastest growing suburbs of Melbourne so
call now!
Manny Chopra 0408023187

http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
